widget.label: Relative Element Selector
widget.description: CSS Selector to find the relative element.
Where to insert the banner in relation to the Relative Element Selector.
widget.label: Insert Method
Banner Div Inline Style
widget.description: Inline Styling refers to any CSS properties and values to be applied directly on the banner div element via a style attribute.

widget.label: CSS
widget.description: CSS appended to the DOM in a <style> or <link> element.

widget.label: Select multiple elements, if matched?
widget.description: If multiple elements match the specified CSS3 selector, should the change be applied to all of them, or just the first one?

widget.label: Re-check for Elements
widget.description: If elements are not found, keep checking every 50ms for up to 3 seconds. Useful for content loaded asynchronously (ajax).
